availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Webster County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary A. Price Baker. Father of Thomas Jefferson Baker, Mary Frances Baker, John Calvin Baker, James Irvine Baker, David Lafayette Baker, Lucy Helen Baker, Issac Newton Baker, Rufus King Baker, and William Kearney Baker.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 82. Some Webster County, Kentucky Families: Baker, Bassett, Givens, Johnson, Payne, Price, Rice, and Others (Baltimore: Gateway Press, Inc., 1983), 8-10.
